title: 96. [Ex Files Pt 2] But they were SO great in the beginning
description:
Hey sis!

This week we are diving into part 2 of the ex-files series where we talk about love bombing, reminiscing on the "good times" with our previous partners, and getting honest with our experiences with them.

You can find Heart Healing 101 the mini course here. 

Save $1300 by joining the waitlist to pre-enroll in Embodied, my 4 month group coaching program here

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
